LanguageData.AgeReversalDemanded.stages.harmful_aging: I'm getting old. I should get an age reversal in a biosculpter pod.
LanguageData.AgeReversalDemanded.stages.terrible_agin: My youth is draining away. I should get an age reversal in a biosculpter pod.
LanguageData.AgeReversalDemanded.stages.horrific_agin: I am trapped in a decaying prison of flesh! I need to get an age reversal in a biosculpter pod.
LanguageData.AgeReversalReceived.stages.received_age_: Aging and death have no hold on me. I am forever, as an enhanced human ought to be.
LanguageData.BioSculpterDespised.stages.used_biosculp: My body was despoiled by the use of a biosculpter pod.
LanguageData.NeedNeuralSupercharge.stages.want_neural: Without a neural supercharge, I'm running below my true capacity. It's depressing.
LanguageData.SleptUsingSleepAccelerator.stages.used_s: I slept with a sleep accelerator. It's helping me attain my true potential, as one should.
